name: Space Shooter (North Art Games)
description:
Space shooter is our latest game in development. Select your space ship and explore the galaxy. Fly into meteor fields and pick up shields to deflect them, avoid space debris, avoid neutron stars and black holes.Pick up stars and coins and upgrade your ship.

The game is in alpha stage of development, the version you see is not final and it's been constantly upgraded and improved. New features added weekly.

You can follow our development progress: 

Twitter

Instagram

Any donation is highly appreciated!!!
